html:
Hello World!

Look at the JS code editor on the right. Between the brackets, type "Hello World!"

Then click the Run button at the top of the screen

You can also use Ctrl+Enter instead of clicking Run.

test.setup: oldLog = console.log; consoleOutput = ''; console.log = x => { consoleOutput += x + '\n'; oldLog(x); };
test.run: consoleOutput = consoleOutput.trim(); if (consoleOutput !== 'Hello World!') fail(`The console output should be "Hello World!". Got "${consoleOutput}"`);

has.message: Your code is missing: console.log("Hello World!")
